elements.label: Name
elements.hint: The name for this feature flag.

elements.label: Key
elements.hint: A unique key used to retrieve this feature flag from the client application. Learn more
elements.notes: Autocompleted in all caps and underscores as the 'Name' field gets typed. 'Learn more' links to https://www.upgradeplatform.org/

elements.label: App Context
elements.placeholder: App Context for this feature flag
elements.hint: The App Context indicates where the experiment will run, known to UpGrade. Learn more
elements.notes: The options are dynamically populated with the values from appContexts: string[]. 'Learn more' links to https://www.upgradeplatform.org/

elements.label: Tags (optional)
elements.notes: This looks like text input, allows entering comma-separated tags that are converted to chips
